PossibleValue.Diagnostic: Hardware NSS signal must be enabled first

RefParameter.Name: CalculateBaudRate
RefParameter.Description: Calculated Baudrate value based on SPI Clock source and Prescaler

RefParameter.Name: CLKPhase
RefParameter.Description: 1 Edge means the first clock transition is the first data capture edge (value 0) AND 2 Edge means the second clock transition is the first data capture edge (value 1)

RefParameter.Name: MasterSSIdleness
RefParameter.Description: Specifies an extra delay, expressed in number of SPI clock cycle periods, inserted additionally between active edge of SS and first data transaction start in master mode.

RefParameter.Name: MasterInterDataIdleness
RefParameter.Description: Specifies minimum time delay (expressed in SPI clock cycles periods) inserted between two consecutive data frames in master mode This parameter can be a value of SPI Master Inter-Data Ideleness.

RefParameter.Name: MasterReceiverAutoSusp
RefParameter.Description: Control continuous SPI transfer in master receiver mode and automatic management in order to avoid overrun condition.

RefParameter.Name: MasterKeepIOState
RefParameter.Description: Control of Alternate function GPIOs state This parameter can be a value of Keep IO State.

Condition.Diagnostic: not available when configurring IP from LPBAM context
not available when configurring IP from LPBAM context
$IpInstance must have a master mode selected
$IpInstance must have a master mode selected
$IpInstance must have a slave mode selected
only available when configurring IP from LPBAM context
